fields.text:
Crimson Muckwader gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp.

{2}{B}: Regenerate Crimson Muckwader. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
{3}, {T} or {U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

Affinity for Swamps (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Swamp you control.)

Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
